entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
